name: Mitm Bug Tracker
author: Mahesh Patel

sections.description:
In this plugin user can submit new bug with some details and user can maintain from WordPress admin panel. also user can put Bug Tracker submit form from front-end using shotcode . Features

  • Add multiple bug os.
  • Add multiple brwoser.
  • Add Bug.
  • No Need Of Knowledge of PHP, HTML or CSS. But for those having knowledge can easly modify or customize.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the mitm-bugtracker folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory OR Upload from Plugins > Add New > Upload zip file.
  2. Go to the ‘Plugins’ page of your WordPress administration area and activate the plugin.
  3. Use the shortcode [mitmbugtracker] in the content area of a page or post where you want the bug tracker to appear.
